      • checkAccessPermissionByIdentifierAndFileName

        protected static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> checkAccessPermissionByIdentifierAndFileName(java.lang.String identifier,
                                                                                                                java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                                                                java.lang.String privilegeName,
                                                                                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                         throws IndexUnreachableException,
                                                                                                                DAOException
        Checks whether the client may access an image (by PI + file name).
        Parameters:
        identifier - Work identifier (PI).
        fileName - Image file name. For all files of a record, use "*".
        request - Calling HttpServiceRequest.
        Returns:
        true if access is granted; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IndexUnreachableException
        DAOException

        logId - The LOGID to check (optional).
        privilegeName - Particular privilege for which to check the permission.

      • checkAccessPermission

        public static boolean checkAccessPermission(java.util.List<LicenseType> allLicenseTypes,
                                            java.util.Set<java.lang.String> requiredAccessConditions,
                                            java.lang.String privilegeName,
                                            User user,
                                            java.lang.String remoteAddress,
                                            java.lang.String query)
                                     throws IndexUnreachableException,
                                            PresentationException,
                                            DAOException
        Parameters:
        allLicenseTypes -
        requiredAccessConditions - Set of access condition names to satisfy (one suffices).
        privilegeName - The particular privilege to check.
        user - Logged in user.
        query - Solr query describing the resource in question.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IndexUnreachableException
        PresentationException
        DAOException
